wikipedia_page.main: Nic Grindrod (born 12 January 1975) is a racecar driver. He has raced the #22 pickup since 2002 in the UK Pickup Truck Racing series.

response: The 2007 Pickup Truck Racing season was the 11th Pickup Truck Racing season. It was won by Steve Dance with 3 race wins and 12 podiums. Going into the final race, Nic Grindrod was twenty points behind Steve Dance but with a second place for Dance and Grindrod finishing outside of the top ten, Dance secured the championship by 65 points. The Rookie trophy was won by Neil Tressler.
